Resources

Community assets and resources related to Radix Themes.

Figma library

Unofficial Radix Themes components for Figma, by Victor Allegret.

Tailwind preset

Configures Tailwind to support Radix Themes tokens, by Viktor Bonino.

If you built something awesome for Radix Themes, feel free to reach out on Twitter, Discord, or GitHub so that we can feature your work on this page.
